org.letras.ps.rawdata.penmanager
Class PenManager

java.lang.Object
  org.mundo.rt.Service
      org.letras.ps.rawdata.penmanager.PenManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.mundo.rt.IEmits, org.mundo.service.IConfigure
public class PenManager
extends org.mundo.rt.Service
implements org.mundo.service.IConfigure

The pen manager service is the main class in the pen manager component. It maintains the currently used IPenAdapterFactory implementations and provides an appropriate method for retrieving the factory to use for a specific driver (c.f. selectPenAdapterFactory(). Additionally it sets up the pen discovery protocol functionality.

The pen manager is implemented as a singleton, therefore its instance can only be obtained using the getInstance() method. It takes the following configuration options (no runtime reconfiguration)

  1. pap-zone: the zone in which pen services hosted will be visible, this will also be the zone for the individual pen data channels

Version:
0.0.1
Author:
felix_h

Constructor Detail

PenManager

public PenManager()
           throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
Simple no-argument constructor. The only reason for it to be publicly accessible is the instantiation policy of Mundo. Normally this constructor will never be used, use the getInstance() method instead. If the constructor is used after the singleton has been instantiated, it will throw an IllegalAccessException.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalAccessException - If this class has already been instantiated (instance != null), this should never happen, since the contract is to use the getInstance() method
Method Detail

getInstance

public static PenManager getInstance()
Method to retrieve the singleton instance of PenManager.

selectPenAdapterFactory

public IPenAdapterFactory selectPenAdapterFactory(IPenDriver driver)
Used to select the IPenAdapterFactory used for a specific IPenDriver implementation.

Parameters:
driver - the driver for which the factory should be provided
Returns:
a IPenAdapterFactory suitable for the provided driver

penService

public PenService penService(java.lang.String penId)
Used to obtain a pen service for a pen with the given id. In case this pen service already exists and is registered at the ServiceManager, a reference to this service is returned. If there is currently no such service, a new service will be created and registered appropriately.

Parameters:
penId - the unique pen id of the pen
Returns:
a reference to the service associated with the pen

killPenService

public boolean killPenService(java.lang.String penId)
Used to unregister and shutdown a given pen service.

Parameters:
penId - the unique pen id of the pen
Returns:
true if the service could be shutdown false otherwise
